pullrequest.title: Added ability to restore UI state

content.raw: So I would stick to the one config file solution and add the ''''if only_window_geometry_is_different''' to the code. Spreading the config data allover doesn't seem clean to me. Also having all geometry data in one place (main window and plots) makes a lot more sense to me, as they would keep the arrangement in respect to each other.(The plot windows aren't being saved currently anyway)
